(Reheheally, Zardus?  Excellent...a weakness to 
exploit...errr...congrats...anyway, Stride, I'm disappointed in Koj and Inu, 
I thought they were stronger.  Also, Koj isn't even up against the full might 
of Alliance)


Oblitertron/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Punch/Unitron/Sixshot/Demon 
Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Serpentor:





Punch looked around as the base seemed to shake.  "What the..." he said, 
unaware of the base being in several different pieces.

---

Nemesis Enforcer walked over to Zardus, followed by Ares and Scattershot.

"Orders?" Nemesis asked.

---

Unitron landed near Zardus, transforming to his biped mode.  "I will guard 
the shuttles if needed."

---

Serpentor just transformed to his king cobra mode, letting his internal 
repairs take over.

---

Sixshot drove up in tank mode, waiting for further orders.

---

Demon Wulf padded over near the bridge section of the base with Flesh Ripper, 
Dark Claw driving up next to them.

---

Oblitertron stomped on scene, transforming into his five seperate robots.

---
